title: PUNISHED FOR MY CONNECTION??????
body:
I just played a ranked game and i got disconnected at level 7 and was disconnected from my internet for about 6 minutes. When i came back into the game, everyone was around level 12 to 13. The problem I have is how can i control if Verizon decides to disconnect on me. I barely ever disconnect and I never just afk and rage quit a game, literally NEVER.  This rarely happens to me and now i have to wait 20 minutes for my next 5 matches? That's about an hour just to play one match which will most likely be more then 30 minutes. I have to do that for 5 matches when I got randomly disconnected. Not just from League but from my internet in generalal. I can't control when my connection disconnects and this rarely ever happens so why am i getting punished? I don't deserve it. 

Also my team won the game that i got disconnected from. I even told them i'm sorry and i got randomly disconnected because of Verizon. They told me it was fine and everything's ok that i got disconnected. So i contributed at the end and we won. There is no need to punish me. Is it possible this punishment can be removed?

replies.body:
*OrneryPossum* is on the right track, regardless of the reason for a disconnection, the fact remains that your absence negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a big reason why the Leaverbuster system treats all disconnections equally and why we are unable to remove any penalties associated with the Leaverbuster system for any reason.

I should also mention that the 5-game penalty can never be added to your account as a result of a single disconnection. We understand that sometimes emergencies happen, which is why it takes a *recent trend of disconnections* to happen on your account before you see this penalty. You can find more on this system inside our [**Leaverbuster FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.
